programme.title: Misi Studi PT3 B.Inggeris Ep10
programme.desc: We will be learning how to answer a Speaking Test and focus on the Part 3 question, which is a discussion task done in pairs. Learn some useful skills on how to do well in a Speaking Test.

programme.title: Misi Studi PT3 B.Inggeris Ep11
programme.desc: Look at some sample questions from Part 1,choosing the correct picture based on listening to the recording and Part 2, the Matching Sequencing where answers have to based on what is heard in the recording.

programme.title: Misi Studi PT3 Matematik Ep10
programme.desc: Membincangkan cara menggunakan garis nombor untuk penambahan integer positif dan penambahan integer negatif. Turut disertakan soalan Pengendalian Data dan cara menyelesaikan Rumus Algebra.

programme.title: Misi Studi PT3 Sains Ep11
programme.desc: Membincangkan cara menghurai dan menjawab soalan , mengenali soalan yang mungkin dikemukaan dalam bahagian ini dan cara terbaik mendapatkan markah penuh.

programme.title: Insane

programme.title: Lump of Sugar

programme.title: The Tooth and the Nail
programme.desc: Based on the novel of the same name by Bill S. Ballinger, the story tells of a magician who plans the most elaborate trick in order to uncover the hidden conspiracy behind his fiance's death.

programme.title: House of the Disappeared
programme.desc: A woman is falsely arrested and imprisoned 25 years for murdering her husband. After her release, she returns to the house to solve the mystery of her husband's death and son's disappearance.

programme.title: The Dude in Me
programme.desc: After a high school student falls from the roof of a building and lands on a mafia boss, they awake to discover they've switched bodies.

programme.title: Remember You
programme.desc: A lawyer suffering from severe memory loss and a total change of character investigates his past and his connection to a woman he meets in a hospital.

programme.title: Shoot Me in the Heart
programme.desc: A young man develops schizophrenia after his mother's suicide. After he meets a kindred spirit at the psychiatric hospital, he forges a plan with the man to escape.

programme.title: A Day
programme.desc: A man commits an unethical act in an attempt to save his daughter's life. Three years later, his actions return to haunt him.

programme.title: Nameless Gangster: Rules of the Time
programme.desc: On the verge of being fired, a corrupt customs official finds a haul of drugs and teams up with a vicious gangster to become the most powerful crime partnership in Busan.

programme.title: Truck
programme.desc: When a truck driver walks in on a gang killing, he agrees to help dispose the bodies in exchange for his life but things take a turn for the worse when a serial killer hitches a ride.

programme.title: Pawn
programme.desc: An unusual family is born as two ruthless loan sharks take in a little girl as collateral for unpaid debts.
